Details.Name: GreateFor
Details.Feature: Earn 1 Citi Dollar for every S$1 spent.
Exclusive party privileges at Zouk, Wine Bar and Velvet Underground-Dance.
For tertiary students; no minimum income required

Details.Name: SmallPrint
Details.Feature: Tertiary student card for students aged 18 and above.

You are eligible for this card if you are a student from any of the following institutions: NTU, NUS, SMU, SIM, SUTD, SIT, University of Chicago Booth School of Business, DigiPen, ESSEC, GIST-TUM Asia, INSEAD, S P Jain, Tisch, UNLV, Nanyang Polytechnic, Ngee Ann Polytechnic, Republic Polytechnic, Singapore Polytechnic, Temasek Polytechnic, LASALLE-SIA and NAFA.
Applicants below the age of 21 must get their parent/guardian's consent to the application, and guarantee for the payment of outstanding balances.
